properties.name: application.security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: Chave secreta para geração de tokens.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.expiration
properties.description: Tempo máximo de vida do token.

properties.description: Nome do bucket na Amazon S3.

properties.description: Tempo de vida do refresh token.
